title: 青い花 1 [Aoi Hana 1]
description: Enduring love, the consequences of choices and coming of age.Fumi and Akira were best friends when they were little, with Akira always looking after the crybaby Fumi. That all ended when Fumi's family moved away, with tearful cries and unfulfilled promises.Several years later, Fumi's family returns, and after she and Akira coincidentally meet on the way to school, they became friends again, quickly slipping back into old patterns.
author: Takako Shimura
